item.title: MyProject code update
item.description:
code update by JM :
Upgraded Apache FOP to version 0.95 and XML Graphics Commons to 1.3.1

item.title: MyProject docs update
item.description: docs update by SNM : Updated plugin documentation to cover the new properties settable by the user, and how to actually set them.

item.title: MyProject code update
item.description: code update by SNM : Made font family specifications available for user changes without changing the plugin code.

item.title: MyProject code update (bug FOR-1087)
item.description:
code update by JM (fixes bug FOR-1087)
: Added support for "sub" and "sup" tags.

item.title: MyProject code update (bug FOR-1072)
item.description:
code update by DC (fixes bug FOR-1072)
: Various bugfixes and improvements for the fo stylesheets. See notes in FOR-1072. Thanks to Jeremias Maerki.

item.title: MyProject code update
item.description: code update by TS : Encapsulated the xsl methods in different helper stylesheet which we can import from the different plugins.

item.title: MyProject code update
item.description: code update by FSO : Moved all libraries and components used by pdf-generation from core into this plugin.

item.title: MyProject code update
item.description: code update by FSO : Updating the fop-library to fop 0.94 and upgrading the stylesheets to work properly with the new and more precise fo-interpeter.

item.title: MyProject code update
item.description:
code update by FSO :
Replaced Cocoon FOP Block with special Forrest edition "cocoon-fop-ng-impl-special" compiled by jeremias. The sources are in the jar. See r603892 and the thread Re: Plans for integrating FOP .94

item.title: MyProject code add
item.description: code add by RDG : Use locationmap for resolution of resources and files. Resources are exposed via {lm:pdf.*}

item.title: MyProject admin add
item.description: admin add by RDG : Extracted code from core of Forrest and placed in a plugin

item.title: MyProject code update
item.description:

: Added support for "sub" and "sup" tags.
